name: little_angry_plum
text: A comment left by little_angry_plum was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, nicklon, Belgand, equinn2006, Ebessan, pquinn87)

name: geysershitdick
text: Can Ray recover from this?

name: paco
text:
yeah, he's getting killed here . . . especially panel five, his response is like a beaten man feebly trying to bat away punches in a fight with tyson or ali.

He's coming back though. Watchout!

name: owangutang
text: Little Nephew needs to show up more.

name: owangutang
text: A comment left by owangutang was marked as spam and excluded. owangutang: What a douche. (reported by mistlethrush, neeva, Magb)

name: saint
text: oooo that is a burn. a burn to the nuts that ray doesn't have no more.

name: red_dawn
text: It's odd that Lil' Nephew is familiar with Morris Day and the Time and yet he thinks Rocky boxes from a wheelchair.

name: saucy_jack
text: I suspect that he actually knows plenty about all of the things he criticizes Ray for mentioning. This isn't the only seemingly strange reference he makes to something that, if he were as ignorant as he seems to be, there's no way he'd know about.

name: ghostd
text:
You guys totally aren't getting into the spirit
When you comment, you rhyme, so c'mon, let's hear it.

name: jstegall
text:
Your comment sounded like a washed up a cheerleader
Sittin' at home with her washed up QB in the wife beater
Hidin' in the bathroom with your man's jaw a flappin'
Screamin' through the door, "DENISE! ARE YOU CRAPPIN'?"

j/k man. Seriously, though, Lil' Nephew is going for some low blows here.

name: conmansj
text:
Yo, don't talk shit 'bout Denise when you're writin' your jams,
Because one must admit that she's got luscious hams.

name: foetus_punch
text:
Chubbies all around, like a gay shame parade
You rhymes are tight, although commansj's was delayed.
Little Nephew's new wave, Ray's old hat
A fedora worn by a mobster settling debts with a baseball bat.
The small fool considers himself wise
The old wiseman can use his words to hypnotize.
Take ten men, and put them in a room with a rhymin' Ray
They'll all be in tears by the end of the day.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Uncle Ray's rhymin' may well be ice cold
But the new generation will surpass the old.
Ray is just taking the bait that is dangled
By the embodiment of all rappin' new-fangled
And while all the ladies might smile when they see him
It's only 'cause he's exhibit #1 at the Hip-Hop museum.

(Hey, this is pretty easy!)

name: belgand
text: No.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: LN's got 12 pages of nothin' but tha rhyyme.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hellofyellin, Overmedicated, equinn2006, Backdraft, STUART, Darthemed)

name: zedpower
text: Nice plucking gesture from Little Nephew there.

name: keithcozz
text: A comment left by keithcozz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, NoneMoreNegative, Jesler729, katsura, werthog42, theplaidknight)

name: ninjaein
text:
The start versus the Epic Rhyme Duel.

We need to see more of these, Onstad!

name: c_dizzle
text: wwwwwww bSNAP! (P.S. I wouldn't mind a week of this).

name: riazm
text: Today whilst getting dressed I realised I was singing this rap. And I knew all the words.

name: ovenface
text: In my head the first few panels read like a Dr. Seuss book instead of a rap.

name: heccibiggs
text: Hahahaha that is a hilarious way to think of this entire strip.

name: gopacapulco
text: that last panel is DANK

name: snowman
text: I don't know why, but I'm not a big fan of the Little Nephew character or these "rap-off" strips.

name: wonelove
text: ooooohshiit

name: troy_convers
text:
'There's cave art of you freakin' to Morris Day & the Time!'
Frikkin class.

name: wallabeechamp
text: I think this is my favorite .gif of all time!

name: freakytiki
text: Panel 3 reminds me of Sage Francis' "battle" with Underground Kid.
